notes.title: Author Contributions
notes.p: Mouhamadou Bamba Sylla and Jeremy S. Pal designed the paper. Mouhamadou Bamba Sylla, Aissatou Faye and Dimobe Kangbeni contributed to the data processing and figures plotting. Mouhamadou B. Sylla, Jeremy S. Pal, Harald Kunstmann, Aissatou Faye, Kangbeni Dimobe contributed to the analysis, discussion, interpretation and writing of the manuscript.
